title: "Request.Browser.Browser" from Microsoft Edge was recognized as "Chrome".
body:
I am a software engineer. When I test Microsoft Edge, I find the "Request.Browser.Browser" from Microsoft Edge was recognized as "Chrome".
I have to distinguish different kinds of browsers for decoding reason. Now I can only distinguish Chrome and Edge by UserAgent. But it is not a good idea at all.
I wish Microsoft can fix this issue.
